languages.text: "Благодарю тебя, Ульфар. Ценно знать, что я заслуживаю доверия Космического волка. И еще ценнее видеть это в пестрых всполохах, что окружают твою яркую душу".
"Thank you, Ulfar. I am pleased to know that I am worthy of the Space Wolf's trust, and even more pleased to see it in the motley flashes surrounding your radiant soul."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю тебя, Ульфар. Ценно знать, что я заслуживаю доверия Космического волка. И еще ценнее видеть это в пестрых всполохах, что окружают твою яркую душу".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you Ulfar. I am pleased to know that I am worthy of the Space Wolf's trust, and even more pleased to see it in the motley flashes surrounding your radiant soul."
"Thank you Ulfar. I am pleased to know that I am worthy of the Space Wolf's trust, and even more pleased to see it in the motley flashes surrounding your radiant soul."
"Thank you Ulfar. I am pleased to know that I am worthy of the Space Wolf's trust, and even more pleased to see it in the motley flashes surrounding your radiant soul."
"Thank you Ulfar. I am pleased to know that I am worthy of the Space Wolf's trust, and even more pleased to see it in the motley flashes surrounding your radiant soul."

languages.text: “谢谢你，乌尔法。能得到太空野狼的信任，我深感荣幸。更令我万分欣悦的是，我看到你的灵魂正闪烁着五彩的光芒，这是你的肺腑之言。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Ulfar. I am pleased to know that I am worthy of the Space Wolf's trust, and even more pleased to see it in the motley flashes surrounding your radiant soul."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，乌尔法。能得到太空野狼的信任，我深感荣幸。更令我万分欣悦的是，我看到你的灵魂正闪烁着五彩的光芒，这是你的肺腑之言。”

languages.text: « Merci, Ulfar. Je suis ravie de voir que je suis digne de la confiance du Space Wolf, et plus encore de le lire dans les lueurs bigarrées de votre âme radieuse. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Ulfar. I am pleased to know that I am worthy of the Space Wolf's trust, and even more pleased to see it in the motley flashes surrounding your radiant soul."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, Ulfar. Je suis ravie de voir que je suis digne de la confiance du Space Wolf, et plus encore de le lire dans les lueurs bigarrées de votre âme radieuse. »

languages.text: "Danke, Ulfar. Es freut mich, dass ich des Vertrauens des Space Wolfs würdig bin, und mehr noch, es in den bunten Farbspritzern rund um Eure strahlende Seele zu sehen."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Ulfar. I am pleased to know that I am worthy of the Space Wolf's trust, and even more pleased to see it in the motley flashes surrounding your radiant soul."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Ulfar. Es freut mich, dass ich des Vertrauens des Space Wolfs würdig bin, und mehr noch, es in den bunten Farbspritzern rund um Eure strahlende Seele zu sehen."

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます、ウルファー。私がスペース・ウルフの信頼に値することが分かり、嬉しく思います。あなたの輝く魂を取り囲む雑多な閃光の中に、それを見ることができるのは、さらに喜ばしいことです」
languages.original_text: "Thank you Ulfar. I am pleased to know that I am worthy of the Space Wolf's trust, and even more pleased to see it in the motley flashes surrounding your radiant soul."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとうございます、ウルファー。私がスペース・ウルフの信頼に値することが分かり、嬉しく思います。あなたの輝く魂を取り囲む雑多な閃光の中に、それを見ることができるのは、さらに喜ばしいことです」

languages.text: «Gracias, Ulfar. Me alegro de contar con la confianza de un Lobo Espacial, y más aún de verla reflejada en los dispares destellos que rodean tu radiante alma».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Ulfar. I am pleased to know that I am worthy of the Space Wolf's trust, and even more pleased to see it in the motley flashes surrounding your radiant soul."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, Ulfar. Me alegro de contar con la confianza de un Lobo Espacial, y más aún de verla reflejada en los dispares destellos que rodean tu radiante alma».

languages.original_text: "Thank you Ulfar. I am pleased to know that I am worthy of the Space Wolf's trust, and even more pleased to see it in the motley flashes surrounding your radiant soul."

languages.text: "Teşekkürler Ulfar. Uzay Kurdu'nun güvenine layık olduğumu öğrendiğime memnun oldum. Işıl ışıl ruhunu çevreleyen rengârenk parıltılardan daha da memnunum."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Ulfar. I am pleased to know that I am worthy of the Space Wolf's trust, and even more pleased to see it in the motley flashes surrounding your radiant soul."

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkürler Ulfar. Uzay Kurdu'nun güvenine layık olduğumu öğrendiğime memnun oldum. Işıl ışıl ruhunu çevreleyen rengârenk parıltılardan daha da memnunum."
